title: Proxy advisory firm InGovern raises concern over delay in Religare AGM
description: Proxy advisory firm InGovern has expressed concern over Religare Enterprises' postponement of its 40th annual general meeting without a valid reason. The delay, which affects the re-appointment of executive chairperson Rashmi Saluja, has led to calls for a Sebi probe. The Burman family, holding a significant stake in REL, has also raised issues regarding insider trading and management control.
